ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And placed a lamp therein brightly burning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and placed therein a hot, shining lamp,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And have kept a very bright lamp in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have made (therein) a shining lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We made a shining lamp,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We appointed a blazing lamp
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And have appointed a dazzling lamp,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We have set therein a glowing lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have set therein lamps glowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and make [the sun for] a radiant lamp?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And placed (therein) a Light of Splendour?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And have made (therein) a shinning lamp (sun).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and placed in them a blazing lamp
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:13] and set a radiant lamp?, namely, the sun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And have appointed a dazzling lamp) and have appointed a radiant sun for the children of Adam,
